StickyScrollbarAdjustmentListener When the scrollbar is at the bottom, then it keeps it there also in the case when new items are inserted at the bottom.
ViewState THIS CODE IS FROM THE PROJECT LOCATED AT http://code.google.com/p/embeddednode/ AND THE RIGHT HAS BEEN GRANTED BY HIS OWNED TO BE USED WITHIN THE ZAP PROJECT
XMLStringUtil  
ZapPortNumberSpinner  
ZapTextArea ZapTextArea is a JTextArea with UndoableEdits.
ZapTextComponentUndoManager ZapTextComponentUndoManager manages a list of UndoableEdits, providing a way to undo or redo the appropriate edits with undo and redo actions accessible through KeyStrokes created with Constant.ACCELERATOR_UNDO and Constant.ACCELERATOR_REDO, respectively.
ZapTextField ZapTextField is a JTextField with UndoableEdits.
ZapXmlConfiguration A XMLConfiguration with character encoding always set to UTF-8 and delimiter parsing always disabled.
 

Enum Summary
ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy There are three policies that affect if, and when, the undoable edits are saved: UndoManagerPolicy.DEFAULT UndoManagerPolicy.ALWAYS_ENABLED UndoManagerPolicy.ALWAYS_DISABLED
